interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pumpkin Enzyme Mask, Skin Exfoliating, Glycolic Acid, Skin brightening face mask, Vitamin C, Fruit Enzymes, Fine lines and dullness, 4 ounces
Review Date: 2020/10/13
Store: CA-PIÈR YOUNG. COMPLEX SKIN. SIMPLE SOLUTION.
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CA-PIÈR YOUNG. COMPLEX SKIN. SIMPLE SOLUTION.', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating,Skin Brightening', 'Scent': 'Pumpkin', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Item Weight': '4 Ounces'}
Review Text: This pumpkin mask looks like something I whipped right up in my kitchen. It smells like fresh pumpkin and appears incredibly fresh. The directions stated that it's not for sensitive skin so I was a little nervous to use but it was not an issue. I had a slight bit of redness but it went away after just a few minutes. Overall, my skin looked fresh and brighter than before. As a weekly treatment this jar will last a good while so the price is not awful for the value. I would definitely purchase again.
Review Title: Brightens skin
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
UMICKOO Hair Straightener,Upgraded Flat Iron for Hair With Real-Time Temperature Display And Adjustable Temperature,1 Inch (Rose Gold) UMIKOO {'Package Dimensions': '14.48 x 4.61 x 2.32 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'UPC': '692232543075'} Let me start by saying that this straightener is very pretty. It is a lovely rose-gold color and has a sleek design. Included in the package was the straightener, a comb, two clips, a heat-resistant glove, and a storage pouch.

There is a digital temperature display that shows the current temperature, which is a really helpful feature. There is also a power button, up/down temperature control, and a barrel lock to keep the clamp closed.

I did find that this straightener heated up really quickly. It did not, however, straighten my hair very efficiently. I had to go over really small sections multiple times to achieve the desired results. That cannot be good for your hair and it took forever! My hair is very thick and on the coarse side so it may be much better suited to someone with finer hair. Overall, this is a definitely a decent straightener but it just didn’t work well for me.
*I received this product at no cost in exchange for a fair and unbiassed review. Didn't work well for my hair 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Pure Daily Care {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} This sanitizer is a great find! It did not dry my hands out or leave them feeling sticky. The package arrived quickly and both bottles were tightly wrapped. I have not been able to find sanitizer in stores and was so excited to find it on Amazon. Very pleased! Great find! Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes Eyenjoy {'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'} Let me start by saying that these are the easiest eyelashes that I have ever used. I was definitely skeptical but it really is as easy as swiping on the magnetic liner and then sticking the lash strip in place. THAT IS IT! No fussing, no dropping, no glue, no 2-piece magnet that you can't ever position properly. Just swipe and stick. Pretty much foolproof! I did find them to be a tad heavy on my eyelid but I imagine that is because I'm not used to wearing false lashes (because I could never figure how to get them on properly...haha) and I'm hoping it will get better with time.

Ok...now onto the negative. While these lashes are absolutely amazing, I was appalled to receive a used tube of eyeliner in my pack. You know the black thread rings that mascara tubes develop after you have removed and inserted the wand a hundred times? That's exactly what the eyeliner tube looked like. A 'sealed' package that contained a used product? Not really sure how that happened. Luckily, the kit contains 2 tubes of eyeliner so I went against my better judgement and decided to try the tube that was obviously (maybe I should say hopefully) not used.

Other than receiving a partially used product, these eyelashes are AMAZING. So easy and fun, I highly recommend!! SO easy to apply! Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz Dr. Denese {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'} I was a bit shocked at how greasy this serum is the first time I used it. I expected it to absorb a little better and not stay so "shiny". That being said, it has not caused my skin to break out or look any oilier throughout the day. I use it in the evenings after washing my face and before my moisturizer. A little goes a looong way so this small bottle will last a really long time.

I have only been using it for a little over a week but my skin already looks better. Definitely more hydrated and smooth. This is a great addition to my skincare routine, I highly recommend. Hydrating serum Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets) Karuna {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrate Skin,Hydrate', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 4.88 x 0.87 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1004 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007166'} This mask feels really awesome! It is easy to use and left my skin feeling very moisturized. Great for a little pampering every week. My only issue is the price; $6+ per treatment seems a little high to me but that's just my opinion. Overall, it's a great product. Moisturizing and easy to use Pumpkin Enzyme Mask, Skin Exfoliating, Glycolic Acid, Skin brightening face mask, Vitamin C, Fruit Enzymes, Fine lines and dullness, 4 ounces CA-PIÈR YOUNG. COMPLEX SKIN. SIMPLE SOLUTION. {'Brand': 'CA-PIÈR YOUNG. COMPLEX SKIN. SIMPLE SOLUTION.', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating,Skin Brightening', 'Scent': 'Pumpkin', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Item Weight': '4 Ounces'} This pumpkin mask looks like something I whipped right up in my kitchen. It smells like fresh pumpkin and appears incredibly fresh. The directions stated that it's not for sensitive skin so I was a little nervous to use but it was not an issue. I had a slight bit of redness but it went away after just a few minutes. Overall, my skin looked fresh and brighter than before. As a weekly treatment this jar will last a good while so the price is not awful for the value. I would definitely purchase again. Brightens skin
profile:
### Updated User Summary

- **Product Aesthetics**: Continues to prioritize attractive design in beauty tools, favoring sleek and appealing appearances.

- **Functionality Preference**: Emphasizes practical features, particularly ease of application, and is open to products that may initially present mixed experiences regarding texture but ultimately provide effective results.

- **Performance Expectations**: Seeks high efficiency from personal care products, appreciating those that visibly enhance skin quality. Recent experiences with exfoliating and brightening products reinforce a strong preference for items that effectively improve skin tone and radiance.

- **Experience with Products**: Willing to experiment with new beauty items while maintaining clear usability preferences. Values products that contribute to significant skin enhancements, even when initial reactions are cautiously optimistic.

- **Review Style**: Appraises products through balanced reviews, highlighting both effectiveness (like skin brightening) and considerations (such as suitability for sensitive skin). This reflects a discerning approach, focusing on impactful, concise feedback while addressing potential drawbacks.

- **Consumer Behavior**: Demonstrates a thoughtful approach to product reviews, focusing on personal experiences and practical needs. Open to investing in higher-priced items if they enhance their skincare routine, with an awareness of budget constraints.

Overall, the user seeks a harmonious balance between aesthetic appeal, effective performance, and user-friendliness in their beauty and skincare choices, consistently pursuing high-quality and effective solutions.
